title: WEHI-SODA-Hub/spatialmibi pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

expression_file.errorMessage: Expression file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.csv' or '.csv.gz'

hierarchy_file.errorMessage: Hierarchy file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.yml' or '.yaml'

markers.errorMessage: Markers must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

cell_types.errorMessage: Cell types must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

parent_types.errorMessage: Parent types must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

downstream_analyses.errorMessage: Downstream analyses must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces
